channel.title: [PI] Adding a endGfx variable for Teleports

item.title: [PI] Adding a endGfx variable for Teleports
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

How could I add this? I believe that it is possible… I have it in and compiling with no errors. Originally before I added in endGfx, the beginning Gfx would work, but after I got in the endGfx niether are showing up… Great news is my animations are working… What do I need to do? Here is my current code… Help?

if (teleportType.equalsIgnoreCase("modern")) { c.startAnimation(13288); c.teleGfx = 0; c.teleTimer = 8; c.teleEndAnimation = 13285; c.teleEndGfx = 5; c.gfx0(2516); c.gfx5(2157); }

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding a endGfx variable for Teleports
